about_the_game:
10 MINUTES HORROR EXPERIENCE

Find out what happened to the family of the main character of 50 Floors.

SYNOPSIS

October 2003. A series of murders and missing residents continues in Smileville. Today, police discovered the bodies of Evelyn Hopper (8 months) and her mother Amanda Hopper (25), which were found to have inverted cross cuts along their bodies, like the other victims. William Hopper (28), the father of the victims, is wanted as a suspect. He has also been attending Holy Eye Church for the past couple of months. The family's son, Alex Hopper (7), was not found at home and is considered missing; a search is underway.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
